type.description: Type of expense (one of the following: CoGBought, CISPaymentsToSubcontractors, StaffCosts, TravelCosts, PremisesRunningCosts, MaintenanceCosts, AdminCosts, AdvertisingCosts, Interest, FinancialCharges, BadDebt, ProfessionalFees, Depreciation, Other)

amount.description: Allowable expenses associated with the running of the business, split by expense type
